blogPosts.title: How Performance Marketing Agencies Can Mislead You
blogPosts.excerpt: Nobody likes waiting especially online. If your site loads slower than a lazy Sunday morning, visitors will not stick around.

content.heading: Stop Making Visitors Wait
paragraphs: Nobody likes waiting especially online. If your site loads slower than a lazy Sunday morning, visitors will not stick around.
Check your speed: Use tools like Google PageSpeed Insights or GTmetrix.
What is slowing you down: Oversized images, clunky plugins, and slow hosting.
Fix it fast: Compress images, enable caching, switch to a content delivery network (CDN), and upgrade your hosting if needed.
Minimize code bloat: Optimize JavaScript and CSS files to ensure they do not slow down loading times.
A slow site does not just push visitors away, it tells them you do not value their time.
